Egusi soup bụ ofe e ji mkpụrụ egusi mee dị ka isi ihe. Mkpụrụ Egusi bụ mkpụrụ abụba na protein nke ụfọdụ osisi cucurbitaceous (squash, melon, gourd)

Egusi soup bụ ihe a na-ahụkarị na mba Central Africa, a pụkwara inye ya n'elu osikapa, akwụkwọ nri e siri esi, ma ọ bụ anụ e siri esi nke ọma, dị ka ewu, ọkụkọ, anụ ehi, ma ọ dị ka azụ. A pụkwara inye ya n'elu akpu
, omelettes, amala, na eba, n'etiti nri ndị ọzọ.  A na-eri ofe Egusi na West Africa, mgbe ụfọdụ na ọkụkọ.

A na-akwadebe ya site n'ịchịcha mkpụrụ egusi, nke a na-eji emepụta ihe. Ihe ndị a na-etinye na ofe nwere ike ịgụnye tomato, yabasị, ose chili, na mmanụ isi nri, dị ka mmanụ nkwụ. Mgbe ụfọdụ, a na-eji mkpụrụ pumpkin dochie anya mkpụrụ egusi.
Egusi soup bụ ụdị ofe e ji mkpụrụ ala mee ka ọ sie ike ma bụrụ ihe a ma ama na West Africa, yana nnukwu ọdịiche dị n'ógbè
E wezụga mkpụrụ, mmiri, na mmanụ, ofe egusi na-enwekarị akwụkwọ nri na akwụkwọ nri ndị ọzọ, ihe na-esi ísì ụtọ, na anụ.
